ygData.subject: Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone managed to consistently get the criteria for using a firework to pull a mob? It seem that when I get the shower of sparks and the message
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone managed to consistently get the criteria for using a firework to
pull a mob?
It seem that when I get the shower of sparks and the message "<mob name>
lights a firework" it will pull them,
but if I get the bolt of light that tracks them, it doesnt pull them, and
just dissapears when it gets to them..

Just wondering, as it is a more colorful method of pulling than throwing
knives or arrows

Omir, Deep Muse of Errolisi Marr, formerly Voriig Kye, Gemchopper.
